page.title: 13 OPINIONS IN ROCKHAMPTON
page.content: Nine people were questioned aged 20-70 years.Most were retired or travel out of Rockhampton for work.The common transport is a car as there is only a bus running through Rockhampton twice a week which is inconvenient for some people.The locals seem to like the area very much and think of it as peaceful, clean and very free from pollution. The people seem not to have been brought up in Rockhampton but born in towns and moved to the area as children, even so there are still a few young couples starting up in some of the newer properties. The only local amenities supplied are the football and cricket clubs and the Post Office which is very small but still supplies the customers with their every needs such as fruit and vegetables, plus the usual Post Office requirements.Oldbury Power Station is
